text: Hitobito no nakaniha,`watashi-tachi wa, arra o shinko shimasu.' To iuga, ichido arra (no michi no tame) ni kunan ni au to, ningen no hakugai o marude arra no chobatsudearu ka no yo ni kangaeru mono ga aru. Mata moshi anata no nushi kara no tasuke (to shori) ga motarasa reru to, kare-ra wa kanarazu,`hontoni watashi-tachi wa, anata gata to isshodeshita.' Nado to iu. Ban'nin no mune no naka ni daku koto o mo yoku shiru okata wa, arrade wanai ka
